title: Getting Started
label: Home
text: This mobile-friendly web app shows information sheets with a title, text, and image. Use the bottom toolbar to navigate.

title: Editing Content
label: Edit
text:
Open sheets.en.json and add items to the array. Each sheet accepts a title, text (

 for new paragraphs), and an image URL.

title: Tips
label: Tips
text: Images are responsive. Keep text concise for small screens. Ensure tap targets are large. Test in portrait and landscape.
